body:
• Erlang VM has built-in support for distribution
  • Processes communicate via messages built on primitives that remain the same regardless of the target node
  • Distribution of work can happen by simply addressing the messages to processes on different nodes
  • Development of distributed systems like Riak is drastically simplified thanks to these features
    • No extra libs
    • Inter-application comms is a breeze
  • Riak Loves Distribution
